name: $_FPS
description: Terminal Empire frames per second.

name: $_LPS
description: The number of script lines processed per second (overall), updated every second.

name: $_SERVER_LPS
description: The number of script lines processed per second (on active server), updated every second.

name: $_DATE
description: The current date, short form.

name: $_LONGDATE
description: The current date, long form.

name: $_TIME
description: The current time, without seconds.

name: $_LONGTIME
description: The current time, with seconds.

name: $_YEAR
description: The current year as an integer.

name: $_MONTH
description: The current month as an integer.

name: $_DAYOFMONTH
description: The day of the current month as an integer.

name: $_DAYOFWEEK
description: The day of the current week as an integer.

name: $_DAYOFYEAR
description: The day of the current year as an integer.

name: $_SECONDS
description: The number of seconds from the current time.

name: $_MINUTES
description: The number of minutes from the current time.

name: $_HOURS
description: The number of hours from the current time.

name: $_TIMESTAMP
description: The current unix timestamp in seconds.

name: $_TIMESTAMP_MS
description: The current unix timestamp in miliseconds.
